name: Doki Doki Chefs
description:
Make soup, save the world! The excitement of Overcooked, now coming to an almost-Gameboy near you. A collaboration between Delisa and Steven! for Demake JAM.

Motion Warning: The title screen of this game includes a scrolling effect which may not be suitable for everyone.

How to play

It takes three chopped tomatoes to make soup! 

Grab tomatoes from the tomato crates at the bottom corners of the screen. Prep them on the cutting boards in the bottom center of the screen, then place them in a pot to cook. Once cooked, put the soup in a bowl, and deliver it at the top of the screen! You have two minutes to make as many as possible so work together! 

Tomatoes, bowls, and pots can be placed on countertops throughout the kitchen, and dirty bowls can be washed in the sinks and reused. If you burn the soup, don't worry! Toss it in the sink and keep going!
